content: Meanwhile, Vander Decken IX (a Japanese bullhead shark fish-man) and his crew, the Flying Pirates, are traveling the ocean floor. Decken angrily asks Wadatsumi if they have received any reply from Shirahoshi. When Wadatsumi answers that she has not replied for the past ten years, Decken throws an axe with a rose on it as a message. Decken then states that she must either marry him or die if she chooses someone else.
